title: Use provided external URL for Hero background image

requirements.text: Update the Home page Hero section background image to load from the external URL "https://i.postimg.cc/rsn7SfgZ/IMG-20260214-021314.jpg" (instead of the current generated static asset), while keeping the existing Hero overlay gradient, layout, and ImageWithFallback behavior.

quotes: Put the new hero image background with "https://i.postimg.cc/rsn7SfgZ/IMG-20260214-021314.jpg" with this url

acceptanceCriteria: The Hero background image request uses exactly https://i.postimg.cc/rsn7SfgZ/IMG-20260214-021314.jpg as the image src.
The Hero section overlay gradient (darkening layer) remains applied on top of the background image.
If the external image fails to load, the existing ImageWithFallback placeholder/fallback UI renders instead of a broken image.
No other sections (Visual Trust, About, Benefits, Support, Footer) have their images changed as part of this update.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutablePaths.
Keep the backend (Motoko single-actor) unchanged for this request.
nonGoals: Do not download/process the external image into a local WebP asset unless explicitly requested.
Do not change WhatsApp CTA behavior, rate limiting logic, or marketing copy as part of this change.
